page.title: 01WEST NOTTINGHAM
page.content: West Nottingham is typical of a densely populated,industrialised city fringe area. Housing-Predominantly council, some private developments. Most building was inter-war (1930's). Industry- Dye-works & hosiery around River Leen. Breweries benefited from local water supply in 19th century. Babbington pit (Cinderhill) a large employer. Transport-The area is within 2 miles of M1 interchanges and has access to the Ring Road.'Bus links with the city are good. Surveys- Our findings indicate general dissatifaction with local amenities. Employment- Better than the National average, but an increasing number of 16+ school-leavers are finding the range of jobs small.
